Package cams.user

Class AuthController

java.lang.Object
cams.user.AuthController
public class AuthController extends Object
The AuthController control is responsible for facilitating User login, logout and change password. It follows the singleton pattern to ensure a single instance throughout the application.
Since:
2023-11-23
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen

    • login

      public User login(String userID, String password) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Validates the user attempting to access the system.
      Parameters:
      userID - the userID associated with a User
      password - the password associated with a User
      Returns:
      the User accessing the system
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when entered userID or password is incorrect

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Sets the currentUser to null and exits the system.

    • getCurrentUser

      public User getCurrentUser()
      Gets the current user associated with the controller.
      Returns:
      the current user

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(String userID, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Changes the password associated with the current user.
      Parameters:
      userID - the userID of the current user
      oldPassword - the old password to be changed
      newPassword - the new password to be set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the "old password" entered is incorrect
